text: hello - apologies for the delay here
We just shipped a Vite upgrade to our build system, some likelyhood this is tied to that
If I'm understanding this correctly, it would be better to fix the circular dependency - that it was working ok before is potentially previously unsupported behavior working

THIS THURSDAY!!!!!
<https://events.HubSpot.com/events/details/HubSpot-developer-presents-building-faster-and-smarter-react-and-HubSpot-cms/|Register now so you get the good seats>!
Thank you <@UAYBXDG4U>. Very sad news haha, I will be doing an enormous refactor today. Thanks for getting back to me though!

If anyone else is encountering this issue, look into removing Barrel index files. These do not play nicely with Vite, and apparently there's a performance impact: <https://vite.dev/guide/performance#avoid-barrel-files>

<@UAYBXDG4U> <@UCY83QS6Q>

I fixed the circular reference errors.

Do you have any idea what this error is for? I'm still not able to build or push up my apps to HubSpot.

Does a manifest need to be added on my end or yours in the Vite config?

Hey, is it possible to select a blog post through fields? I couldnâ€™t find a way. We want to build a component where a selected post can be highlighted.

`Couldn't run the project command because there are scopes missing in your production account` Cant publish anymore updates. Nothing has changed in the config or somehting..

```[ERROR] Couldn't run the project command because there are scopes missing in your production account. To update scopes, deactivate your current personal access key for **, and generate a new one. Then run `hs auth` to update the CLI with the new key. 
- All of the following scopes are required.```
